Package net.canarymod.api.inventory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimalInventory
    Animal Inventory wrapper interface
    BaseItem
    Base Item to retrieve Item statistics
    CraftingMatrix
    Crafting Matrix sharer interface This interface is so Workbench and PlayerCraftingMatrix can be sent the same
    CustomStorageInventory
    Custom Inventory wrapper interface
    Enchantment
    Enchantment interface
    EnderChestInventory
    Enderchest inventory interface
    Hopper
    Interface for Hoppers, At the time of writing this includes HopperBlock and HopperMinecart.
    Inventory
    Generic item inventory.
    Item
    This wraps an item stack
    MapData
    Map Data API
    PlayerCraftingMatrix
    The Player's crafting space
    PlayerInventory
    Player and NPC Inventory wrapper interface
    VillagerInventory
    Villager inventory interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ItemType
    Item Types
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Enchantment.Type
    Type - used to identify enchantments
    InventoryType
    Inventory Type enum

    List of all inventory types
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ItemTypeException
    Thrown when trying to create an invalid ItemType
